how come there is option rescue and no option for bootloader rescue on ubuntu :/
because the bootloader bootstraps everything else
the bios reads the mbr of the first hard drive in order to know how to boot the operating system. No bootloader on the mbr, nothing will load an os
mbr is master boot record. That's where the bootloader lives
i know that part, but what is bootstrap ?
start from scratch. Comes from the phrase, 'lift yourself by your bootstraps' , the little loops on the top of a pair of boots
